				Ok, it's been a long day, and I promise this will be a short post.
				</h3>
		<p>First, I got a third installment in the Getting Started Programming on Mac OS X series planned for tomorrow. Second, my life is generally very cool these days. Third, I am like going to collapse from exhaustion within the next 15 minutes. Fourth, the end. -Goodnight, sleep tight. -Spencer</p>
